availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Baker (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Baker. Father of James L. Baker, C. B. Baker, W. S. Baker, Harvey D. Baker, Franklin P. Baker, David S. Baker, Sallie Baker, and Fannie Baker. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Sheriff of Hopkins County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 218.
Find A Grave, "William R. Baker (October 12, 1815-February 3, 1864)," Memorial #60813232, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60813232 (accessed April 18, 2018).
KYR-0001-020-1530.
